segments.text: This is the Bell Captain's Desk . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I've been waiting for my bags to be sent up for the last half hour . Where are they ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm very sorry to hear that . May I have your name and room number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And how many pieces did you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two suitcases and a handbag . The suitcases are blue and the shoulder bag is red .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a name tag attached to them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're very sorry for the delay . I'll check immediately and call you back .
segments.speaker: S1
